events.description: Halloween Pumpkin Hunt Quests will be distributed. Complete Quests that involve gathering special items or slaying certain large monsters to receive Pumpkin Tickets which can be used to forge and upgrade your Jack-o’-Head equipment!
A Halloween Medal Acquisition Quest will be distributed. Complete this to receive the Halloween Pumpkin Hunt Medal!

events.summary: Appearance of Kulu-Ya-Ku with pumpkin-like rock
events.description: Between these dates, Kulu-Ya-Ku holding a pumpkin-like rock will appear in larger numbers than usual. Slaying them will reward you with Pumpkin Tickets.
Introducing the Halloween-exclusive Jack-o’-Head armor with Skill: Solidarity (Pumpkin Hunt).
